description: This file defines a React functional component named 'EmptyState' which renders a stylized placeholder with optional action button and icon, intended for use as a friendly empty state indicator in a UI.

methods.name: EmptyState({ title, message, actionLabel, onAction, icon = "empty" })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a styled placeholder with optional action button and icon.
